home.headline: Hello World
home.bio: I'm 37. Since 2017 I've been building justjoin.it, and since 2018 — rocketjobs.pl. Together with a team of 100+ people, we're trying to make a positive impact on the job market in Poland. I also run the Aula Polska foundation, which has been teaching people how to build startups for 18 years.
home.bio_personal: Outside of work — football, chess, and 20th century history.
home.disclaimer: Honestly? I don't know yet what this site will become. Maybe just a personal page, maybe a blog about what I'm learning along the way. We'll see. I'm treating it as my playground and a place to learn vibe coding — so you'll probably find a bunch of random, unrelated things here that make absolutely no sense. That's kind of the point :)
